alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dallas County through 715 PM CDT... At 638 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Camden, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dannelly Reservoir, Carlowville and Tilden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
